title: Evenepoel Cracks on Killer New Climb as Tiberi Takes Control of UAE Tour
content:
Del Toro second on savage Jebel Mobrah summit after late chase falls short as Evenepoel crumbles out of GC picture.

Read the full article at Evenepoel Cracks on Killer New Climb as Tiberi Takes Control of UAE Tour on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
